Text: Me̩ te̩wʼemi, ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ ki agʼakpa,
Ef okuta bo̩lo̩ bo̩lo̩ ef o̩go̩ le̩ oñ ukpe̩-we̩ de̩;
E̩ne̩ oñ e̩ dejiji-wñ kʼe̩ la chokpo
E̩gba kʼe̩ kwa, mak abo kʼe̩ gba jo̩ le̩ ki gbʼe̩ ke!
Todu abu kʼE̩ne̩ ki ne̩ atate̩
Todu iñwa-mi eje̩ kpʼone̩ chʼogbegbele̩ n,
Todu ugbite̩re̩ ejufufu-wñ oñ u we̩do̩,
U fʼo̩na o̩na-wñ li me̩, omi muda achʼo̩ga-wñ kpa;
Ame̩ne̩bibi muda dab omi ohimini ki aro̩ gbagbagba;
Ure̩do̩ do̩mo̩ ñw ame̩ne̩bibi n, O̩jo̩-mi ka-i.
